content.rendered:
Every year the nuts on the Pongamia tree are harvested. The nut consists of 58% crude oil and 42% protein.

The crude oil is refined into green fuel in Latin America and then sold to parties such as Shell and BP. The nut’s residual product is sold as protein-rich concentrate to local livestock farmers 🐄
